name: Blinding Light
description:
In a town at the edge of the world, people sail the celestial sphere and fish for stars, which they then process and consume. This is why everyone here is glowing.

What you'll do

  • Your mother asked you to go get your sister for the family dinner.
  • Solve puzzles and help those in need.
  • And don’t fall off the edge of the world!

Controls

WASD - Move

E - Interact

SPACE - Jump, Climb on Ledge

CTRL - Drop from Ledges

SHIFT - Toggle Walking

Q - Rewind Time

Credits

  • I used 15.ai to generate AI NPC voices.
  • T-Rex model made by Rigsters.
